sub_fields.instructions: Search by name or SKU to auto-fill fields below

sub_fields.label: Free Item SKU
sub_fields.name: free_item_sku

fields.label: Authority Subtitle
fields.name: authority_subtitle
fields.instructions: Subtitle under the main title, e.g., 'The Creator of ILLUMODINEâ„¢'

fields.instructions: e.g., 'MD, PhD, Holistic Health Pioneer'

fields.name: authority_image_alt
fields.instructions: Describe the authority photo for accessibility and SEO.

fields.label: Authority Image ALT Text
fields.name: authority_image_alt
fields.instructions: Describe the authority photo for accessibility and SEO.

fields.label: Article Link Text
fields.name: authority_article_text
fields.instructions: Button text, e.g., 'Read Full Article About Iodine'

fields.label: Quote Categories
fields.name: authority_quote_categories
fields.instructions: Group quotes by category (e.g., 'On Detoxification', 'On General Wellness')

sub_fields.label: Quotes
sub_fields.name: quotes
sub_fields.instructions: One quote per line (without quotation marks)

fields.label: Testimonials Subtitle
fields.name: testimonials_subtitle
fields.instructions: Subtitle under the main title, e.g., 'Real results from real people'

fields.label: Columns
fields.name: testimonials_columns
fields.instructions: Number of columns in grid mode

fields.label: CTA Button Behavior
fields.name: cta_button_behavior
fields.instructions: Control what happens when CTA buttons are clicked

fields.label: Button URL
fields.name: cta_button_url
fields.instructions: Leave empty to use checkout URL

fields.label: Show All Offers in Checkout
fields.name: checkout_show_all_offers
fields.instructions: When enabled, displays all offers in checkout. When disabled, shows only the selected offer.

fields.label: Checkout SPA Instructions
fields.message:
Checkout SPA Shortcode

The checkout flow uses a Single Page Application (SPA) that handles checkout - upsell - thank-you steps without page reloads.

Setup Instructions:

  1. Create a WordPress page for checkout (e.g., "Illumodine Checkout")
  2. Set the page permalink to: /express-shop/{funnel-slug}/checkout/
  3. Add this shortcode to the page content:
[hp_funnel_checkout_app]

Optional attributes:

[hp_funnel_checkout_app funnel="illumodine"]   <!-- By slug -->
[hp_funnel_checkout_app id="123"]              <!-- By post ID -->
[hp_funnel_checkout_app product="SKU123"]      <!-- Pre-select product -->

What the SPA handles automatically:

  • Product selection with quantity
  • Customer lookup on email blur
  • Auto-fill address for returning customers
  • Points redemption (if enabled below)
  • Stripe Elements inline payment
  • 3D Secure authentication
  • One-click upsell offers
  • Thank you page with order summary

fields.label: Free Shipping Countries
fields.name: free_shipping_countries
fields.instructions: Comma-separated country codes, e.g., US,CA,GB

fields.label: Text Accent
fields.name: text_color_accent
fields.instructions: Headings, CTAs

fields.label: Override Heading Colors?
fields.name: text_color_accent_override
fields.instructions: Use accent color for all headings instead of default text color

fields.label: Basic Text
fields.name: text_color_basic
fields.instructions: Main text (off-white)

fields.label: Note Text
fields.name: text_color_note
fields.instructions: Secondary (muted)

fields.label: Discount Text
fields.name: text_color_discount
fields.instructions: Savings (green)

fields.label: Page BG Color
fields.name: page_bg_color
fields.instructions: Solid or gradient start

fields.label: Card Background
fields.name: card_bg_color
fields.instructions: Cards/panels

fields.label: Input Background
fields.name: input_bg_color
fields.instructions: Form inputs

fields.label: Border Color
fields.name: border_color
fields.instructions: Borders/dividers

fields.label: Custom CSS
fields.name: custom_css
fields.instructions: Custom CSS for this funnel. Use .hp-funnel-{slug} as the root selector.

fields.label: Disclaimer
fields.name: footer_disclaimer
fields.default_value: These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

fields.label: Focus Keyword
fields.name: seo_focus_keyword
fields.instructions: Main keyword this funnel is optimized for.

fields.label: Meta Title
fields.name: seo_meta_title
fields.instructions: Custom SEO title (falls back to Funnel Name).

fields.label: Meta Description
fields.name: seo_meta_description
fields.instructions: Brief summary for search results.

fields.label: Cornerstone Content
fields.name: seo_cornerstone_content
fields.instructions: Is this a key piece of content on your site?

fields.label: Brand Override
fields.name: funnel_brand_override
fields.instructions: Override auto-detected brand. Leave empty to auto-detect from products (defaults to "HolisticPeople").

fields.label: Detected Brand
fields.name: funnel_brand
fields.instructions: Calculated on save. If all products share one brand, uses that; otherwise uses default.

fields.label: Min Price
fields.name: funnel_min_price
fields.instructions: Minimum offer price (never $0).

fields.label: Max Price
fields.name: funnel_max_price
fields.instructions: Maximum offer price.

fields.label: Availability
fields.name: funnel_availability
fields.instructions: Auto-calculated from product stock status.

fields.label: Condition
fields.name: funnel_condition
fields.instructions: Product condition for schema (usually "New" for supplements).

fields.label: Price Range Label (Optional Override)
fields.name: funnel_price_range_label
fields.instructions: Custom label for displaying price range. Leave empty for auto-generated label.
